text: Framestore was working on shots in the human army base (not full cg). things like the amp suits (robots with soldiers inside) walking about, ships arriving/ leaving etc..   was ok. was one of the first projects I worked on as a lighter. mostly light rigs were provided to me by the sequence leads.
Everything was a bit more difficult back then - I don't think we were even ray tracing much. lots of baking occlusion onto assets and stuff like that
That's very interesting, I had no idea, I somehow assumed raytracing was around for longer, but yeah makes sense! Do you have any show you especially liked working on?
Also I totally missed your message about calling sometime, if you want to that'd be great. Do you use discord? feel free to add me there ( Daniel Ravanelli#4843 )
